Text: Thank you for sharing this rare film which has not been shown on any available Nordic channels during the last 15 years, with a very young John Cusack.

Earlier I watched the movie from close-up and found the video quality to be poor.But watching it again from a distance,the quality is quite ok.Hence I revise my earlier comment.
